Post-Match Reflections: Josh Tebeau said, “It’s the coolest thing that’s ever happened to me. I’m the luckiest, most grateful person in the world.”
Miscellaneous Highlights: Detroit clinched its first playoff berth since 2014
Others: Josh Tebeau was brought down to the field by several Detroit players to join in the celebration, and he was even invited to be in the team picture.
Tebeau was given a pumpkin seed by Tarik Skubal at a game in April, which he believed was a 'premonition' of the team's playoff run.
